channel.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
channel.description:
Tangeld’s ghost sipped a lovely brew of tea. “And how exactly has your Flower Festival been going, Mayor Arete? I know how much the people needed to take their mind off of things after that whole unpleasant business with the demon incursion a few months back.”
Arete sighed. “Not well, I’m afraid. We’ve had certain, er… complications that have put somewhat of a damper on the celebrations.”
“Don’t be coy, old friend. You mean to say ‘there’s another demon running around, we’re all gonna die, how could we have been so foolish as to think we were safe?’.”
“You know me too well, Tan.” Arete reached for their own teacup, but their ghostly fingers passed right through the handle.
“It’s an acquired skill, grabbing things with incorporeal hands. Don’t worry, you’ll get better at it the longer you’re dead.” From outside, screaming could be heard. “It would seem that they’ve found your body. Well then, I think it’s time we address the people.”
“Right, we’ve got to contain the chaos before the peo-“
“No, Arete, there’s no containing chaos. Nothing to do but watch it all unfold. I’m sure these folks are smart enough to figure things out. Come on then. Time to go to work.”
# Day 1 has begun! Nomination phase will begin at [date=2020-03-03 time=22:30:00 timezone="America/Chicago"]. # “Alms for the poor?” @Apprentice the Beggar has come to Ravenswood Bluff! # “Non nobis, domine. Per gratiam tui.” @DatBird the Bishop has come to Ravenswood Bluff!
# Information on game rules can be found in the OP of this thread (I didn't want to type it all out again): https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-blood-on-the-forums-2-electric-fang-gu-signups-closed/80424
# Hosts: Tangeld Arete # Seating arrangement (1 and 14 are considered adjacent): 1. Marshal 2. Wazza 3. DirectorHail 4. Magnus 5. EVO 6. Shurian 7. Universal 8. ~~Simon~~ Insanity 9. Italy 10. Datbird (Bishop :church: ) 11. N.1 12. ~~Nuclear_Rehab~~ Geyde 13. Apprentice (Beggar :bowl_with_spoon: ) 14. Vulgard # Spectators: Jgoesgaming # Backups: Insanity

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
like

what’s the worst thing that could happen

they give you info while being evil

at which point you’ve locked them into a certain part of their claim, and you can if you wish choose to ignore it

Read full topic

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
N.1:

and both wazza and nuclear were players i socially scumread extremely at that time so i was never going to listen to anything either of them had to say

Arete:

I think ultimately the reason town lost is that town wasn’t willing to trust each other

thinking face

Read full topic

item.description:
it wasn’t that much of a D2 time difference
and both wazza and nuclear were players i socially scumread extremely at that time so i was never going to listen to anything either of them had to say

getting datbird to openwolf was very valuable and absolutely worth my life

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Tangeld
item.description:
Unless I’m gravely mistaken, Nuclear outed their info publicly D1 and got told that they were probably Channel-Mastered (again, this was why I felt obligated to not announce the removal of Channel-Master and instead rand a meaningless target for it), and Wazza was publicly, albeit indirectly, claiming very weird info (claimed that the Storyteller was a Minion) before Apprentice got a token.

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.description:

Town Crier had bad info N2, Oracle had bad info N2

what? this aligns with when it became mechconfirmed anyway (d2)
the slank was inevitable regardless

Read full topic

Dreamer had bad info N1

i wasn’t talking to nuclear because i still scumread him

item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Tangeld
item.description:
…I’d just like to say again that town should have realized a Vortox game much sooner. Dreamer had bad info N1, Town Crier had bad info N2, Oracle had bad info N2… That many people get bad info early, it’s Vortox.

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Tangeld
item.description:
I debated making a formal announcement that Channel-Master wasn’t even in play, but given that Channel-Master not being in play kind of confirmed that Vortox was messing with Dreamer info (there wouldn’t have been any other good reason to give Dreamer such obviously bad info), there was a bit of an obligation on our end to keep that one in.

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Tangeld
item.description:
We also excluded Dreamer and Seamstress from the rand because we didn’t realize until midway through D1 that we… hadn’t actually placed the Channel-Master because of the Vortox, and Dreamer and Seamstress had already acted by this point.

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
yes i know; it was going to be after BotF III anyways
i figured you weren’t going to play since you’re so busy… but i figured it couldn’t hurt to ask. Your counsel in forming the setup was extremely valuable anyway, so thank you.
Marshal and I decided to replace palabra de dios with shacklewight. Now we’re done.

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Tangeld
item.description:
Oh, that… technically didn’t matter because Vortox was in play and so every Townsfolk was forced to get wrong info anyway, but we randed Channel-Master and it landed on Savant.

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

Read full topic

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Tangeld
item.description:
N.1:

he tried to after apprentice was forcibly exiled
ergo it was refunded

Shurian actually did give over the ghost vote before Apprentice traveled away, but this was while we were still trying to prod Apprentice for activity, and we decided not to resolve Shurian giving ghost vote to Beggar (or show Beggar Shurian’s alignment) until and unless Beggar came back online. This did not happen, and Shurian’s ghost vote was formally refunded upon the Beggar’s traveling away.

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
Arete:

it would plausibly not have been obvious to Wazza why killing Apprentice would be weird in the first place

You might think this but I never would have; i assure you that
our minds work differently
so again, neither of us is ever going to convince each other of anything, so let’s agree to disagree

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
N.1:

That’s a slippery slope argument

no it’s not

my argument is that it would plausibly not have been obvious to Wazza why killing Apprentice would be weird in the first place (just like it wasn’t obvious to Nuclear that dreaming about Dat was weird)

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
Arete:

also I disagree with this, purely on the basis of the fact that Nuclear failed to realize that Travellers were a thing and attempted to dream about DatBird

That’s a slippery slope argument
im not saying that because i don’t think he wouldn’t have known killing a traveler was possible; of course he could have
i’m saying that because 1) wazza has too little experience with this game to put the thought into whether killing a traveler would be optimal or not and 2) shurian could only mechlock the game if she was good; not evil

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
N.1:

Also i’m confident that i would have been able to mechread that wazza never would have killed the beggar
he’s too unfamiliar with this game

also I disagree with this, purely on the basis of the fact that Nuclear failed to realize that Travellers were a thing and attempted to dream about DatBird

Read full topic
item.source: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
This game was dangerouly close to getting mechlocked lol
Evil could have won much more easily if apprentice died N2
Heck, the only reason i threw myself on the sword there was because vortox’s existence was mechconfirmed (if that wasn’t so, for the record, I wouldn’t have done that and good would have lost D2)

Read full topic

item.description:
from vortox’s PoV, he knew bishop was evil D1, he knew mutant died D1, therefore almost a certainty to an experienced player beggar was good and had the power to mechconfirm the existence of vortox D2

Read full topic

im talking about from the vortox’s pov

item.title: (Misc) Blood on the Forums 2 - Electric Fang Gu (Evil Wins)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
I can tell you that if i was hail i absolutely was killing apprentice night 2
i would have known that no evil were nominated day 1 and if i let apprentice live the type of demon in the game would become mechconfirmed
that sort of thing is usually devastating to evil in this game. It can’t happen outside of the exact combination of mutant / maddened death + good beggar + vortox lol

Read full topic
